title: Ludic Numbers (medium)
text:
Find the number ofLudic numbersless than or equal to $N$.InputThe first line contains $T$ ($1 \le T \le 1000$), the number of test cases.Each test case contains a single integer $N$ ($1 \le N \le 10^9$).OutputFor each test case, output the number of Ludic numbers less than or equal to $N$.ExampleInput10
1
2
3
4
5
10
100
1000
1000000
1000000000Output1
2
3
3
4
5
24
142
66164
43956562NoteSeeLUDIC2for a harder version.Other references for the Ludic numbers:Ludic numbersorA003309.
